column1: Uchi////The last thing that annoyed me was when my husband made the reservation for our birthdays (my 35 and his 36)
column2: he thought they would give us a complimentary dessert to celebrate
column3: but we ended up buying our own (fried milk). Not a big deal
column4: but considering other upscale restaurants do it
column5: it was another tick against Uchi.
